verses.verse: וַיִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <S%H7901><s%> slept יְהֽוֹשָׁפָט֙ <S%H3092><s%> Now Jehoshaphat עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲבֹתָ֔יו <S%H1><s%> with his fathers וַיִּקָּבֵ֥ר <S%H6912><s%> and was buried עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲבֹתָ֖יו <S%H1><s%> with his fathers בְּעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> in the city דָּוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> of David וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned יְהוֹרָ֥ם <S%H3088><s%> And Jehoram בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <S%H8478><s%> his place

וְלֽוֹ־ אַחִ֞ים <S%H251><s%> And he had brethren בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the sons יְהוֹשָׁפָ֗ט <S%H3092><s%> of Jehoshaphat עֲזַרְיָ֤ה <S%H5838><s%> Azariah וִֽיחִיאֵל֙ <S%H3171><s%> and Jehiel וּזְכַרְיָ֣הוּ <S%H2148><s%> and Zechariah וַעֲזַרְיָ֔הוּ <S%H5838><s%> and Azariah וּמִיכָאֵ֖ל <S%H4317><s%> and Michael וּשְׁפַטְיָ֑הוּ <S%H8203><s%> and Shephatiah כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אֵ֕לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> all these [were] the sons יְהוֹשָׁפָ֖ט <S%H3092><s%> of Jehoshaphat מֶ֥לֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> gave לָהֶ֣ם ׀ <S%H1992><s%> like אֲ֠בִיהֶם <S%H1><s%> And their father מַתָּנ֨וֹת <S%H4979><s%> gifts רַבּ֜וֹת <S%H7227><s%> them great לְכֶ֤סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver וּלְזָהָב֙ <S%H2091><s%> and of gold וּלְמִגְדָּנ֔וֹת <S%H4030><s%> and of precious things עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with עָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> cities מְצֻר֖וֹת <S%H4694><s%> with fenced בִּֽיהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> in Judah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּמְלָכָ֛ה <S%H4467><s%> but the kingdom נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> gave לִֽיהוֹרָ֖ם <S%H3088><s%> he to Jehoram כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> because ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he הַבְּכֽוֹר׃ <S%H1060><s%> because he [was] the firstborn פ

וַיָּ֨קָם <S%H6965><s%> was risen up יְהוֹרָ֜ם <S%H3088><s%> Now when Jehoram עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over מַמְלֶ֤כַת <S%H4467><s%> to the kingdom אָבִיו֙ <S%H1><s%> of his father וַיִּתְחַזַּ֔ק <S%H2388><s%> he strengthened וַיַּהֲרֹ֥ג <S%H2026><s%> himself and slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> all his brethren בֶּחָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> with the sword וְגַ֖ם <S%H1571><s%> also מִשָּׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> and [divers] also of the princes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> [was] thirty וּשְׁתַּ֛יִם <S%H8147><s%> and two שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> years יְהוֹרָ֣ם <S%H3088><s%> Jehoram בְּמָלְכ֑וֹ <S%H4427><s%> when he began to reign וּשְׁמוֹנֶ֣ה <S%H8083><s%> eight שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem

וַיֵּ֜לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> walked בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ ׀ <S%H1870><s%> in the way מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> after עָשׂוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> like as did בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> the house אַחְאָ֔ב <S%H256><s%> of Ahab כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> for he had the daughter אַחְאָ֔ב <S%H256><s%> of Ahab הָ֥יְתָה <S%H1961><s%> become לּ֖וֹ אִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> to wife וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and he wrought הָרַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> in the eyes יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> was not אָבָ֣ה <S%H14><s%> would יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Howbeit the LORD לְהַשְׁחִית֙ <S%H7843><s%> not destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> the house דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> of David לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> because הַבְּרִ֔ית <S%H1285><s%> because of the covenant אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which כָּרַ֖ת <S%H3772><s%> that he had made לְדָוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> with David וְכַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which אָמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> and as he promised לָתֵ֨ת <S%H5414><s%> to give ל֥וֹ נִ֛יר <S%H5216><s%> a light וּלְבָנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> to him and to his sons כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for הַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> for ever

בְּיָמָיו֙ <S%H3117><s%> In his days פָּשַׁ֣ע <S%H6586><s%> revolted אֱד֔וֹם <S%H123><s%> the Edomites מִתַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> from under the dominion יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וַיַּמְלִ֥יכוּ <S%H4427><s%> and made עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> over מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> themselves a king

וַיַּֽעֲבֹ֤ר <S%H5674><s%> went forth יְהוֹרָם֙ <S%H3088><s%> Then Jehoram עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with שָׂרָ֔יו <S%H8269><s%> with his princes וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָרֶ֖כֶב <S%H7393><s%> and all his chariots עִמּ֑וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become קָ֣ם <S%H6965><s%> with him and he rose up לַ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> by night וַיַּ֗ךְ <S%H5221><s%> and smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱדוֹם֙ <S%H123><s%> the Edomites הַסּוֹבֵ֣ב <S%H5437><s%> which compassed him in אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> about וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> שָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> and the captains הָרָֽכֶב׃ <S%H7393><s%> of the chariots

וַיִּפְשַׁ֨ע <S%H6586><s%> revolted אֱד֜וֹם <S%H123><s%> So the Edomites מִתַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> from under the hand יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> to this אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> Then תִּפְשַׁ֥ע <S%H6586><s%> revolt לִבְנָ֛ה <S%H3841><s%> [also] did Libnah בָּעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> The same time הַהִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> the same מִתַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash יָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> from under his hand כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because עָזַ֔ב <S%H5800><s%> because he had forsaken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God אֲבֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> of his fathers

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Moreover ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he עָשָֽׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> Moreover he made בָמ֖וֹת <S%H1116><s%> high places בְּהָרֵ֣י <S%H2022><s%> in the mountains יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וַיֶּ֙זֶן֙ <S%H2181><s%> to commit fornication אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> and caused the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem וַיַּדַּ֖ח <S%H5080><s%> and compelled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> Judah פ

וַיָּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> And there came אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> then מִכְתָּ֔ב <S%H4385><s%> a writing מֵֽאֵלִיָּ֥הוּ <S%H452><s%> to him from Elijah הַנָּבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying כֹּ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵי֙ <S%H430><s%> God דָּוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> of David אָבִ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> thy father תַּ֗חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not הָלַ֙כְתָּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> Because thou hast not walked בְּדַרְכֵי֙ <S%H1870><s%> in the ways יְהוֹשָׁפָ֣ט <S%H3092><s%> of Jehoshaphat אָבִ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> thy father וּבְדַרְכֵ֖י <S%H1870><s%> nor in the ways אָסָ֥א <S%H609><s%> of Asa מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

וַתֵּ֗לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> have walked בְּדֶ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> in the way מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַתַּזְנֶ֤ה <S%H2181><s%> to go a whoring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> and hast made Judah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> and the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem כְּהַזְנ֖וֹת <S%H2181><s%> like to the whoredoms בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house אַחְאָ֑ב <S%H256><s%> of Ahab וְגַ֨ם <S%H1571><s%> have also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַחֶ֧יךָ <S%H251><s%> thy brethren בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִ֛יךָ <S%H1><s%> of thy father's הַטּוֹבִ֥ים <S%H2896><s%> [which were] better מִמְּךָ֖ <S%H4480><s%> than הָרָֽגְתָּ׃ <S%H2026><s%> and also hast slain

הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> behold יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> will the LORD נֹגֵ֛ף <S%H5062><s%> smite מַגֵּפָ֥ה <S%H4046><s%> plague גְדוֹלָ֖ה <S%H1419><s%> Behold with a great בְּעַמֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5971><s%> thy people וּבְבָנֶ֥יךָ <S%H1121><s%> and thy children וּבְנָשֶׁ֖יךָ <S%H802><s%> and thy wives וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all רְכוּשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H7399><s%> and all thy goods

וְאַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> you בָּחֳלָיִ֥ים <S%H2483><s%> sickness רַבִּ֖ים <S%H7227><s%> And thou [shalt have] great בְּמַחֲלֵ֣ה <S%H4245><s%> by disease מֵעֶ֑יךָ <S%H4578><s%> of thy bowels עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until יֵצְא֤וּ <S%H3318><s%> fall out מֵעֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H4578><s%> until thy bowels מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> because הַחֹ֔לִי <S%H2483><s%> by reason of the sickness יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> day עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> by day

וַיָּ֨עַר <S%H5782><s%> stirred up יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Moreover the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יְהוֹרָ֗ם <S%H3088><s%> against Jehoram אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> ר֤וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> the spirit הַפְּלִשְׁתִּים֙ <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines וְהָ֣עַרְבִ֔ים <S%H6163><s%> and of the Arabians אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> able כּוּשִֽׁים׃ <S%H3569><s%> the Ethiopians

וַיַּעֲל֤וּ <S%H5927><s%> And they came up בִֽיהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> into Judah וַיִּבְקָע֔וּהָ <S%H1234><s%> and brake וַיִּשְׁבּ֗וּ <S%H7617><s%> into it and carried away אֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָרְכוּשׁ֙ <S%H7399><s%> all the substance הַנִּמְצָ֣א <S%H4672><s%> that was found לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> in the king's וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> together בָּנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons וְנָשָׁ֑יו <S%H802><s%> also and his wives וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> no נִשְׁאַר־ <S%H7604><s%> left לוֹ֙ בֵּ֔ן <S%H1121><s%> so that there was never a son כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo יְהוֹאָחָ֖ז <S%H3059><s%> him save Jehoahaz קְטֹ֥ן <S%H6996><s%> the youngest בָּנָֽיו׃ <S%H1121><s%> of his sons

וְאַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> And after כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all זֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise נְגָפ֨וֹ <S%H5062><s%> smote יְהוָ֧ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> all this the LORD בְּמֵעָ֛יו <S%H4578><s%> him in his bowels לָחֳלִ֖י <S%H2483><s%> disease לְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> else מַרְפֵּֽא׃ <S%H4832><s%> cure

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> came לְיָמִ֣ים ׀ <S%H3117><s%> And it came to pass that in process of time מִיָּמִ֡ים <S%H3117><s%> years וּכְעֵת֩ <S%H6256><s%> after צֵ֨את <S%H3318><s%> fell out הַקֵּ֜ץ <S%H7093><s%> the end לְיָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> years שְׁנַ֗יִם <S%H8147><s%> of two יָצְא֤וּ <S%H3318><s%> came מֵעָיו֙ <S%H4578><s%> his bowels עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> by reason חָלְי֔וֹ <S%H2483><s%> of his sickness וַיָּ֖מָת <S%H4191><s%> so he died בְּתַחֲלֻאִ֣ים <S%H8463><s%> diseases רָעִ֑ים <S%H7451><s%> of sore וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no עָ֨שׂוּ <S%H6213><s%> made ל֥וֹ עַמּ֛וֹ <S%H5971><s%> And his people שְׂרֵפָ֖ה <S%H8316><s%> no burning כִּשְׂרֵפַ֥ת <S%H8316><s%> for him like the burning אֲבֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> of his fathers

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> years old שְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <S%H7970><s%> Thirty וּשְׁתַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H8147><s%> and two הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become בְמָלְכ֔וֹ <S%H4427><s%> was he when he began to reign וּשְׁמוֹנֶ֣ה <S%H8083><s%> eight שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem וַיֵּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> departed בְּלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no חֶמְדָּ֔ה <S%H2532><s%> without being desired וַֽיִּקְבְּרֻ֙הוּ֙ <S%H6912><s%> Howbeit they buried בְּעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> him in the city דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> of David וְלֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> no בְּקִבְר֥וֹת <S%H6913><s%> but not in the sepulchres הַמְּלָכִֽים׃ <S%H4428><s%> of the kings
